unnormalised: **EV Charging Gets a "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge" Moment in Delhi!**
normalised: **Electric Vehicle Charging Gets a "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge" Moment in Delhi!**

unnormalised: Delhiites, ditch the petrol pumps, EV charging is getting a makeover, *bade bade deshon mein* and now, even in our Dilli! The automotive scene is buzzing with the news of faster and more accessible charging options.
normalised: Delhiites, ditch the petrol pumps, electric vehicle charging is getting a makeover, *bade bade deshon mein* and now, even in our Dilli! The automotive scene is buzzing with the news of faster and more accessible charging options.

unnormalised: IIT Delhi researchers have apparently cracked the code for more efficient fast charging, meaning less waiting time for your Tata Nexon EV. Imagine, quicker than a chai break at Connaught Place!
normalised: Indian Institute of Technology Delhi researchers have apparently cracked the code for more efficient fast charging, meaning less waiting time for your Tata Nexon Electric Vehicle. Imagine, quicker than a chai break at Connaught Place!

unnormalised: Rumor has it, charging stations are popping up faster than you can say "Bijli Bill." We're seeing them everywhere from Gurgaon malls to even near those famous Chandni Chowk jalebi stands.
normalised: Rumor has it, charging stations are popping up faster than you can say "Bijli Bill." We are seeing them everywhere from Gurgaon malls to even near those famous Chandni Chowk jalebi stands.

unnormalised: And get this, some companies are even offering subscription models for unlimited charging for around Rs. 2,500 a month. Cheaper than refuelling your old Maruti 800!
normalised: And get this, some companies are even offering subscription models for unlimited charging for around rupee two thousand five hundred a month. Cheaper than refuelling your old Maruti eight hundred!

unnormalised: The government is pushing for charging stations every 50 km on major highways. Road trip to Jaipur in your electric car? No problem, boss!
normalised: The government is pushing for charging stations every fifty kilometer on major highways. Road trip to Jaipur in your electric car? No problem, boss!

unnormalised: Plus, there's talk of solar-powered charging points. Imagine charging your EV with the power of Surya Dev!
normalised: Plus, there is talk of solar-powered charging points. Imagine charging your Electric Vehicle with the power of Surya Dev!

unnormalised: This whole EV charging revolution is giving us major "DDLJ" vibes - finally, a happy ending for the environment (and our wallets, hopefully)!
normalised: This whole Electric Vehicle charging revolution is giving us major "D D L J" vibes - finally, a happy ending for the environment (and our wallets, hopefully)!
